product_page.scss:
#body > div.header-container.sticky-header,
#product-images-container
  > div.main-image-container
  > div.productImageSlider.slider-for.slick-initialized.slick-slider.ready
  > div,
#product-images-container
  > div.slider-nav.slick-initialized.slick-slider
  > div
  > div
  > div.slick-slide.slick-active.last
  > div,
#product-images-container
  > div.main-image-container
  > div.productImageSlider.slider-for.slick-initialized.slick-slider.ready
  > div
  > div
  > div.slick-slide.slick-current.slick-active
  > div
  > li,
#carousel-active > div > ul > section > div > div,
#carousel-active > div > ul > section > div > div > li,
#product-images-container
  > div.slider-nav.slick-initialized.slick-slider
  > div
  > div
  > div.slick-slide.slick-current.slick-active
  > div {
  background: white !important;
}

#product-page-no-sidenav
  > div.productView.thumbnail-unclicked.qty-box-visible
  > article
  > ul
  > li.tab.warranty,
#body
  > div.body.content
  > div
  > div.recommended-visibility
  > div.product.main.left.no-sidenav
  > div
  > div
  > div.similar-products-by-views
  > h2,
#carousel-active > div > h2 {
  background: $primaryRed !important;
  border-bottom: 3px solid $bottomBorder !important;
}

#product-page-no-sidenav
  > div.productView.thumbnail-unclicked.qty-box-visible
  > article
  > ul
  > li.tab.overview {
  background: $primaryRed !important;
}
